resources.string: An Instant messaging App, find out the users of the Conekto messenger App and connect with them in Realtime. Explore the Users List and start to communicate with the users. Get to know who is online with the Online Indication mark in Chats list when someone is online.
Thanks for using this App. Hello User, I am Krishna Kumar, an experienced Android Developer. Please let me know a few points of feedback that you want to go over in the review.
